'''''Dag''''' is a Sindarin word which means "slay."<ref>{{Cite web|articleurl=https://www.elfdict.com/wt/131426|articlename=Slay|author=Parf Edhellen: an elvish dictionary|accessed=22 October 2024}}</ref>
==Etymology==
[[Sundocarmë|Root]] [[NDAK]]<ref>{{HM|LR}}, [[The Etymologies]] p. 375</ref>
==Other forms==
*''degi'' (inf)
*''danc'' pa. t.
*''dangen'' p.p.
==See also==
*''[[dagnir]]''
*''[[dagor]]''
*[[Dagmor]]

==Cognates==
*[[Quenya]] ''[[nahta]]'' (not direct cognate since it has the ending ''-ta'')
